---
title: Transverse Ligament of the Atlas (TLA)
---

The TLA is vital to both atlanto-axial kinematics and *literally* vital.

TLA ruptures can be lethal since nothing will prevent the dens from compressing the [medualla oblongata]({{< var ref-medulla-oblongata.path >}})

# Dysfunction

The TLA can be damaged from dislocation of the [median atlanto-axial joint]({{< var ref-atlanto-axial-joint.path >}}) @jonesProjectFoundations2025.
